Carnatron did not dare speak infront of Hydras. He sent a telepathic message 
to her, "We will discuss this later."
> In a message dated 3/29/03 12:28:48 AM Central Standard Time, 
> aerosmith4e@... writes:
> 
> 
> > He sighed, "My name is Carnatron formaly known as Proto1000. I have been 
> > Galvatron's loyal bot since he was created by unicron. I was created by 
> > Unicron to serve him and will till my spark stops pulsating. I have gone 
> > through great evolutions and now I am ready to help him bring back the 
> > glory 
> > of the decepticons, and with Prime back....its going to be that much 
> > sweeter. 
> > Satisfied?"
> > 
> 
> "Quite," she stated dryly. But.. she was all the more truly satisfied. 
> 
> As she moved towards the Bridge. "So.. you served Galvatron?" her distaste 
> was slightly apparent. But she was even more curious about this Decepticon. 
> "Do forgive me, as I do not know you well enough. Though... it does bring me 
> 'joy' to know that another Decepticon is within my presence." continuing in 
> her deep & sophisticated femme voice. Her claws clasped behind her as she 
> strode along talking to Carnation.
